diff_act: 3.enable citizens to provide additional information related to ongoing cases
5.provide information or tips related to ongoing cases
6.receive updates about the status of their reports or inquiries

regen.absent_element: enabling citizens to report crimes and lodge complaints
regen.new_specification: The Citizen Interface module of the CCTNS shall enable citizens to report crimes and lodge complaints directly to police units.

regen.absent_element: reporting crimes and receiving responses through the Citizen Interface
regen.new_specification: The Citizen Interface shall enable citizens to report crimes and receive prompt responses from the police units regarding these reports.

regen.absent_element: ensuring quickness and efficiency of communication
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that all communications are acknowledged within a predefined time frame to facilitate quick and efficient interactions.

label: The police in turn can use it to respond to citizens with very little turnaround time.
absence: action of respond to citizens by police
